steps.title: Welcome to Fortune's Hand!
steps.content: A deckbuilder roguelike combining cards, slots, and roulette. Match poker hands, spin slots for bonuses, and risk it all on the roulette!

steps.title: Slot Machine
steps.content:
Each turn starts with a slot spin. Match 3 symbols for powerful bonuses!

üÉè Card = Extra draws
üéØ Target = Roulette bonuses
üí∞ Gold = Instant gold
‚≠ê Star = JACKPOT!

steps.title: Draw Your Hand
steps.content: After the slot spin, you'll draw 8 cards. Use slot bonuses to draw more cards!

steps.title: Select Cards
steps.content: Click on cards to select them (up to 5). Make the best poker hand you can!

steps.title: Play Your Hand
steps.content:
Click 'Play Hand' to score your selected cards. Higher poker hands = more points!

You can also discard cards to draw new ones (limited uses).

steps.title: Score Calculation
steps.content:
Your score is calculated based on:
‚Ä¢ Poker hand type (Pair, Flush, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Card chips and multipliers
‚Ä¢ Joker bonuses
‚Ä¢ Slot bonuses

steps.title: Roulette - Risk It All!
steps.content:
Spin the roulette to multiply your score... or land on 0 and lose it all!

You can skip the roulette to keep your current score safely.

steps.title: Reach the Goal
steps.content:
Score enough points before running out of hands to beat the round!

Each successful round unlocks the shop where you can buy powerful Jokers.

steps.title: The Shop
steps.content:
Buy Jokers to gain powerful effects!

Jokers activate during specific phases to boost your score, modify slots, or enhance roulette.

steps.title: Ready to Play!
steps.content:
You're all set! Good luck on your run.

Remember: Fortune favors the bold... but not the reckless!
